nodes.text: K-3RNL was a R4-series agromech droid in the service of the Galactic Republic during The Clone Wars. The droid was considered to be corny, yet sweet.
K-3RNL was a droid purchasable in the Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures video game. It was able to be purchased exclusively during the Halloween season.

K-3RNL's name resembles the word "kernel," as in a kernel of corn. This is likely a pun referencing the droid's color scheme which, along with the R4-series' distinctive head shape, gives K-3RNL a resemblance to the common Halloween sweet candy corn.
